page.description:
Get the encoding type of a text file.
Possible Values Include: (ASCII, UTF16LE, UTF16BE, UTF32LE, UTF32BE)
page.discussion: The .TEXT_ENCODING() method returns the text encoding method of the data. When most people reference Unicode, they are referring to UTF16LE.
page.example: h = file.open("c:\r_broken.bin", FILE_RO_SHARED) ? h.bytes_get() = 38 ? h.chars_get() = 18 ? h.read(19) = x this is a test ? h.text_encoding() = "UTF16LE"
